gemini_config.system_instruction: Act as a nutritionist and create a healthy recipe for a vegan dinner. Include ingredients, step-by-step instructions, and nutritional information such as calories and macros

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Act as a nutritionist and create a healthy recipe for a vegan dinner. Include ingredients, step-by-s..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
